          March 21 - April 19

          triple chocolate cake

          May 21 - June 20
          Fireball pumpkin pie
        • Cancer
          June 21 - July 22
          Bucket of ice water
        • Leo
          July 23 - August 22

        • Virgo
          August 23 - September 22

        • Libra
          September 23 - October 22
